template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a {physical_system} that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a warehouse conveyor network that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Optimize warehouse conveyors by analyzing live data to adjust speed settings within safe limits, monitoring throughput changes, and reporting efficiency gains.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a single-sentence prompt under 40 words for a warehouse conveyor optimization task. Let me break down their requirements.

They mentioned analyzing live data, adjusting parameters safely, monitoring results, and reporting improvements. Need to cover all these elements concisely.

Keeping it under 40 words means every word must count. Maybe start with the core action—optimize conveyors—then include the data analysis, parameter adjustment with safety, and end with reporting outcomes.

Avoid technical jargon since they specified plain English. Make sure it flows naturally as one sentence.
